repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: Kheel Center Triangle Fire Centennial Commemoration Collection.
did.abstract: This is the main collection for the commemoration of the Triangle Fire, there are sub-collections containing memorabilia and audio-visual material.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183kheel_center@cornell.eduhttp://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This is the main collection for the commemoration of the Triangle Fire, there are sub-collections containing memorabilia and audio-visual material.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Kheel Center Triangle Fire Centennial Commemoration Collection. #6317. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
